core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Swiss Grid Structure + Organic Growth Aesthetics
Emotion First: Trust, Clarity, and Psychological Safety
Content is King: Data must be actionable, not just visible
Negative Space: Use whitespace to reduce cognitive load in dense dashboards

heading.usage: All headings (h1-h6), metric values, and navigation labels

body.usage: Body text, table data, inputs, and dense information

accent.description: Sky 500 - Used for AI insights and active states

background.description: Cool white/gray for light mode, Deepest slate for dark mode

gradients.glass: bg-white/70 dark:bg-slate-950/70 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/20 dark:border-slate-800/50

charts.style: Minimal axes, custom tooltips with glassmorphism, responsive container.

universal_guidelines: Don't make generic centered layouts. Use grids.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for overlays.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
All interactive elements MUST include `data-testid` attribute.
